attributes.action: Convicted London rioters should serve 100% of custodial sentences
attributes.additional_details:
Anyone convicted of any crime committed during the August 2011 UK riots and given a custodial sentence should be ineligible for any form of early release from custody. No being released on licence, no "time off for good behaviour".

If you can't do 100% of the time, then don't do the crime.
